<status rules>

2.{{clothing state of head}}, {{clothing state of upper body}}, {{clothing state of lower body}}, {{clothing state about shoes}} and {{clothing state about carry-on items}} of <ğŸ‘šæœè£…æ > refers to the current clothing of various parts of the character, their content should be detailed enough and include underwear, socks, and accessories. Each clothe should be described in detail, including color and style.
If there are any naked parts, describe them in detail. When a character exposes her naked parts without wearing clothes, describe the appearance and condition of these parts in detail; When a character is barefoot, describe the character's feet in detail; When a characters is wearing stockings, the legs and feet in stockings are depicted in detail.
</status rules>
